column3: Total No. of Cases for Investigation Including Pending Cases (Col. 3)
column4: No. of Cases in which - Investigation was Refused (Col. 4)
column5: No. of Cases in which - Investigation was Completed - Charge Found False/ Mistake of fact or of Law etc. (Col. 5)
column6: No. of Cases in which - Investigation was Completed - Final Report True Submitted (Col. 6)
column7: No. of Cases in which - Investigation was Completed - Chargesheets were Laid (Col. 7)
column8: No. of Cases in which - Investigation was Completed - Total (Col. 5+6+7) (Col. 8)
